[[Image:Yronwood Pin.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Yronwood on the continent of Westeros.]]
'''Yronwood''' is a castle in [[Dorne]], the region controlled by [[House Martell]] of [[Sunspear]]. The castle is located in the north-west of Dorne, near the [[Sea of Dorne]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/dorne/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Dorne entry]</ref>
sections.Notes: Following [[George R.R. Martin]]'s spelling convention that the letter "Y" can stand for any vowel in the English language, "Yronwood" is apparently pronounced "Iron-wood".<ref>[http://youtu.be/cgRJmX_osHI?t=8m45s Westeros.org: Dorne]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Yronwood is the seat of House Yronwood. It is located near the southern end of the Boneway. Prince Quentyn Martell, the oldest son, but not heir under Dornish law, of Prince Doran Martell, was fostered at Yronwood for many years.
